languages.text: {n}Кровь бросается вам в лицо, барабанами начинает колотить в виски, вязким пологом покрывает язык и губы. Вы перестаете чувствовать руки и ноги — словно вся жизненная сила пытается покинуть ваше тело, вместе с красными сгустками излившись изо рта. Великан задает вам вопросы, на которые вы покорно и торопливо отвечаете, даже не понимая, о чем говорите.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Кровь бросается вам в лицо, барабанами начинает колотить в виски, вязким пологом покрывает язык и губы. Вы перестаете чувствовать руки и ноги — словно вся жизненная сила пытается покинуть ваше тело, вместе с красными сгустками излившись изо рта. Вы боитесь, неистиво, отчаянно боитесь — и этот страх вливается в вас откуда-то извне, повинуясь чужой воле.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You feel blood rushing to your face, drumming in your temples, coating your tongue and lips in a viscous membrane. You no longer feel your arms and legs — as if your entire life force is trying to leave your body, pouring out of your mouth along with globs of crimson. The giant Chaos Space Marine is asking you questions, which you are answering obediently and hurriedly, not even comprehending what you are talking about.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кровь бросается вам в лицо, барабанами начинает колотить в виски, вязким пологом покрывает язык и губы. Вы перестаете чувствовать руки и ноги — словно вся жизненная сила пытается покинуть ваше тело, вместе с красными сгустками излившись изо рта. Великан задает вам вопросы, на которые вы покорно и торопливо отвечаете, даже не понимая, о чем говорите.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You feel your blood flushing, drumming in your temples, coating your tongue and lips in a viscous membrane. You no longer feel your arms and legs — as if your entire life force is trying to leave your body, pouring out of your mouth along with the crimson gouts. Uralon is asking you questions, which you are answering obediently and hurriedly, not even comprehending what you are talking about.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sientes que tu sangre enrojece tu cara, retumba contra tus sienes y cubre tu lengua y tus labios con una membrana viscosa. Ya no sientes tus extremidades: es como si tu fuerza vital intentara escapar de tu cuerpo, saliendo de tu boca acompañada de gotas carmesíes. El colosal Marine Espacial del Caos te hace preguntas a las que respondes en tono obediente y presuroso sin entender siquiera lo que dices.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel blood rushing to your face, drumming in your temples, coating your tongue and lips in a viscous membrane. You no longer feel your arms and legs — as if your entire life force is trying to leave your body, pouring out of your mouth along with globs of crimson. The giant Chaos Space Marine is asking you questions, which you are answering obediently and hurriedly, not even comprehending what you are talking about.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sientes que tu sangre hierve, retumba contra tus sienes y cubre tu lengua y tus labios con una membrana viscosa. Ya no sientes tus extremidades: es como si tu fuerza vital intentara escapar de tu cuerpo, saliendo de tu boca acompañada de gotas carmesíes. El colosal Marine Espacial del Caos te hace preguntas a las que respondes en tono obediente y presuroso sin entender siquiera lo que dices.{/n}

languages.text: {n}顔に血が上がり、こめかみがうずき、舌と唇が粘り気のある粘膜で覆われていく。腕と脚の感覚が失われた。まるで生きる力が身体から離れ、真っ赤な塊とともに口から流れ出ていくような気分だ。強大な渾沌のスペースマリーンの質問に対して従順に、かつ急いで答えるあまり、自分でも何を言っているのかわからない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel blood rushing to your face, drumming in your temples, coating your tongue and lips in a viscous membrane. You no longer feel your arms and legs — as if your entire life force is trying to leave your body, pouring out of your mouth along with globs of crimson. The giant Chaos Space Marine is asking you questions, which you are answering obediently and hurriedly, not even comprehending what you are talking about.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}顔に血が上がり、こめかみがうずき、舌と唇が粘り気のある粘膜で覆われていく。腕と脚の感覚が失われた。まるで生きる力が身体から離れ、真っ赤な塊とともに口から流れ出ていくような気分だ。強大な渾沌のスペースマリーンの質問に対して従順に、かつ急いで答えるあまり、自分でも何を言っているのかわからない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你感到血液全涌到了脸上，不断猛力敲击着你的太阳穴，在你的舌头和嘴唇上留下一层黏糊糊的东西。你感觉不到你的四肢，仿佛全身的生命力都打算逃离你的身体，深红色的液体一滴滴从你嘴里流了出来。体格硕大的混沌星际战士不断地向你发问，而你只是顺从又急促地回答，甚至都不知道自己说了些什么。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel blood rushing to your face, drumming in your temples, coating your tongue and lips in a viscous membrane. You no longer feel your arms and legs — as if your entire life force is trying to leave your body, pouring out of your mouth along with globs of crimson. The giant Chaos Space Marine is asking you questions, which you are answering obediently and hurriedly, not even comprehending what you are talking about.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你感到血液在涌动起来，不断猛力敲击着你的太阳穴，在你的舌头和嘴唇上留下一层黏糊糊的东西。你感觉不到你的四肢，仿佛全身的生命力都打算逃离你的身体，深红色的液体一滴滴从你嘴里流了出来。体格硕大的混沌星际战士不断地向你发问，而你只是顺从又急促地回答，甚至都不知道自己说了些什么。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous sentez votre sang affluer vers votre visage et se mettre à tambouriner sous vos tempes, tandis que votre langue et vos lèvres semblent se couvrir d'une substance visqueuse. Vous ne sentez plus vos membres, et votre force vitale s'échappe de votre corps par giclée, comme en témoignent les gouttelettes écarlates qui jaillissent de votre bouche. L'énorme Space Marine du Chaos vous interroge, et vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de répondre, docilement, les mots pleuvant si rapidement que vous ne comprenez pas vos propres paroles.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel blood rushing to your face, drumming in your temples, coating your tongue and lips in a viscous membrane. You no longer feel your arms and legs — as if your entire life force is trying to leave your body, pouring out of your mouth along with globs of crimson. The giant Chaos Space Marine is asking you questions, which you are answering obediently and hurriedly, not even comprehending what you are talking about.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous sentez votre sang affluer dans vos tempes et se mettre à tambouriner, tandis que votre langue et vos lèvres semblent se couvrir d'une substance visqueuse. Vous ne sentez plus vos membres, et votre force vitale s'échappe de votre corps par giclée, comme en témoignent les gouttelettes écarlates qui jaillissent de votre bouche. L'énorme Space Marine du Chaos vous interroge, et vous ne pouvez vous empêcher de répondre, docilement, les mots pleuvant si rapidement que vous ne comprenez pas vos propres paroles.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spürst, wie dir das Blut durch den Körper rauscht, in deinen Schläfen pocht, deine Zunge und Lippen mit einer zähen Schicht bedeckt. Du kannst deine Arme und Beine nicht mehr spüren — als würde deine gesamte Lebenskraft versuchen, deinen Körper zu verlassen, zusammen mit tiefroten Tropfen aus deinem Mund strömen. Der riesige Chaos Space Marine stellt dir Fragen, die du gehorsam und eilige beantwortest, ohne überhaupt zu verstehen, wovon du sprichst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel blood rushing to your face, drumming in your temples, coating your tongue and lips in a viscous membrane. You no longer feel your arms and legs — as if your entire life force is trying to leave your body, pouring out of your mouth along with globs of crimson. The giant Chaos Space Marine is asking you questions, which you are answering obediently and hurriedly, not even comprehending what you are talking about.{/n}

Du kannst deine Arme und Beine nicht mehr spüren — als würde deine gesamte Lebenskraft versuchen, deinen Körper zu verlassen, zusammen mit tiefroten Tropfen aus deinem Mund strömen. Der riesige Chaos Space Marine stellt dir Fragen, die du gehorsam und eilige beantwortest, ohne überhaupt zu verstehen, wovon du sprichst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vücudundaki kanın yüzüne sıçradığını hissediyorsun. Şakaklarında âdeta davullar çalıyor, dilini ve dudağını yoğun bir sıvı kaplıyor. Kollarını ve bacaklarını hissedemiyorsun. Yaşam gücün, bedenini tümüyle terk etmeye çalışıyor sanki. Çıkış kapısı olarak ağzını seçiyor ve kızıl öbeklerle birlikte vücudundan ayrılıyor. Dev Kaosçu Uzay Piyadesi'nin sorduğu soruları aceleyle ve itaatle yanıtlıyor, söylediklerini anlayamıyorsun bile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You feel blood rushing to your face, drumming in your temples, coating your tongue and lips in a viscous membrane. You no longer feel your arms and legs — as if your entire life force is trying to leave your body, pouring out of your mouth along with globs of crimson. The giant Chaos Space Marine is asking you questions, which you are answering obediently and hurriedly, not even comprehending what you are talking about.{/n}
